title: Harvest Moon Recipe
full_text:
Harvest Moon Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
3 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
3 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
Wild Turkey Rye
1
ounce
Lillet Blanc
1/2
ounce
Laird's Bonded Apple Brandy
1/2
ounce
Green Chartreuse
3
dashes
Abbott's bitters
or
Angostura bitters
Orange twist
, for garnish
Directions
Stir rye, Lillet Blanc, apple brandy, Chatreuse, and bitters with ice and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.
Special Equipment
mixing glass, cocktail strainer
Whiskey
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
Halloween
